New Records: Klay Thompson made a career-high 6 three-pointers in his Dallas Mavericks debut
Key Match Events: The Mavericks pulled away in the third quarter with a strong defensive performance
Pre-Game Insights: The game was the opener for both teams
Luka Doncic scored 28 points and 10 rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: The coach highlighted the victory as a great start for the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at American Airlines Center
The line was DAL -8.5 and over/under 226.5
Others: Luka Doncic's performance was noted by the assistant coach
